alert.note: Alert for Ottawa; Sandusky; Wood (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 20 at 6:26PM EDT until July 20 at 7:15PM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: The National Weather Service in Cleveland has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Ottawa County in northwestern Ohio... Sandusky County in northwestern Ohio... Central Wood County in northwestern Ohio... * Until 715 PM EDT. * At 625 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Genoa, or 13 miles southeast of Toledo, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...At 618 PM, a 59 MPH wind gust was measured at Toledo Executive Airport. IMPACT...Minor damage to vehicles is possible. Expect damage to trees and power lines. * Locations impacted include... Bowling Green, Fremont, Port Clinton, Perrysburg, Bellevue, Clyde, Rossford, Waterville, Oak Harbor, Gibsonburg, Genoa, Woodville, Weston, Elmore, Ballville, Catawba Island, Walbridge, Pemberville, Millbury and Haskins. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
